channel.title: Post on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Post on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Creating Your Very Own Hugo Website.
item.description:
Introduction.

Having a website is one of those things that a lot of people talk about but not everyone actually ever does. With the power of Hugo and GitHub Pages the usual challenges of: How to I get a domain and put it on the Internet? And It seems like so much work… Essentially boil down to just a learning curve that although it seems steep at the start becomes almost trivial once you’ve got the hand of it.
